items.title: Watch: What it was like in the courtroom at Maduro's hearing
items.description: The BBC's Madeline Halpert was inside the room as the former Venezuelan president addressed the judge.

items.title: US sharply criticised by foes and friends over Maduro seizure
items.description: The US taking of Venezuela's leader has faced strong criticism from both America's friends and foes.

items.title: 'I'm a prisoner of war' - In the room for Maduro's dramatic court hearing
items.description: During the 40-minute arraignment, Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flores, pleaded not guilty to drugs and weapon charges.

items.title: Trump's seizure of Maduro raises thorny legal questions, in US and abroad
items.description: US Attorney General Pam Bondi has said Maduro was brought to the US to "face justice". Some experts have concerns.

items.title: Thirty-two Cubans killed during US attack on Venezuela
items.description: Cuba's president said military and intelligence operatives were providing protection to captured leader Nicol√°s Maduro.
